/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban setting. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
